name: Disclosure of equivalent information
text: [§431:4-236]  Disclosure of equivalent information.  Unless proxies, consents, or authorizations with respect to a stock of a domestic insurer, subject to section 431:4-231, are solicited by or on behalf of the management of the insurer from the holders of record of stock of the insurer in accordance with this part and the schedules thereunder prior to any annual or other meeting, the insurer shall file with the insurance commissioner and transmit to all stockholders of record information substantially equivalent to the information that would be required to be transmitted if a solicitation were made. [L 2000, c 24, pt of §2]
